channel.title: What tracks directly inspired your own music?
channel.description:
So, curious to know and cool to share…
Show us one track that you made – **and the track that first (or most) inspired it.**
  Here's one to get the ball rolling…
Me: [You Don't Know (2017)](https://soundcloud.com/akasnd/you-dont-know) Inspired by the drums from [Ultravox - Vienna (1981)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DuCIGvsbMA)

item.title: What tracks directly inspired your own music?

item.description:
One of my more recent tracks, this one: https://soundcloud.com/pinewoodog/dreams

Was really inspired by this and a couple of other songs: https://soundcloud.com/mdkofficial/mdk-altitude

item.title: What tracks directly inspired your own music?
item.dc:creator: xavior
item.description:
I’ve got a few examples if that’s okay

Me (and HAYVN): Dream Within A Dream
Inspiration: Massive Attack - Teardrop

Me: Ashen (feat. Athena Dawn)
Inspiration: Rezz - Diluted Brains (song structure and second drop) and Rezz x Laura Brehm - Melancholy (vocals)

Me: Purpose (feat. Produk)
Inspiration: No Mana - Back Alley Time Machine

Read full topic

item.title: What tracks directly inspired your own music?
item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
TheRealJFalc:

ITS AMAZING OMG

Yays!

Yeah, a lot of my music is inspired in some way by the music in the Metroid Prime Trilogy, I absolutely love those games. I need MP4 to come out soon. Pls.

Read full topic

item.title: What tracks directly inspired your own music?

item.description:
Really?! MP2 was my favorite of the trilogy! Sick! I can’t wait to listen to it!

Edit: ITS AMAZING OMG
